description: This application contains animated exercises for Frozen Shoulder which can be done in the convenience and privacy of your own home. Exercises: Exercises,Stretching Exercises,Shoulder Flexion Stretch,Shoulder Abduction Stretch,Shoulder External Rotation Stretch,Posterior Capsule Stretch,Inferior Capsule Stretch ,Active Exercises,Self Assisted Exercise ,Pendular Exercise,Flexion Wand Exercise,Extension Wand Exercise,Internal and External Wand Exercise,Towel Strecth Exercise,Shoulder Flexion ,Shoulder Extension ,Shoulder Abduction,Shoulder External and Internal Rotation,Strengthening Exercises,Resisted Shoulder Flexion,Resisted Shoulder Extension,Resisted Shoulder Abduction,Resisted Shoulder External Rotation,Resisted Shoulder Internal Rotation,Stabilization Exercises,Shoulder Stabilization Exercise. This application is not meant to be used in any medical or legal decision making, or they should contact emergency response 911 when they are in a medical urgent situation for example.
